title: ICYMI - Derek Jeter on Reshaping the Miami Marlins and Giving Athletes a Voice
itunes:title: ICYMI - Derek Jeter on Reshaping the Miami Marlins and Giving Athletes a Voice
description:
Miami Marlins co-owner Derek Jeter talks about transitioning from MLB star to CEO and providing athletes with a platform to express themselves via The Players' Tribune.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
